created.description: The time at which the population entry was created.

creator.description: The UUID of the creator of the problem.

egp_problem.description: SHA256 or SHA1 (in the LSB's) of the git commit to pull OR the path to a locally defined problem.

inputs.description: JSON list of valid EP_TYPE_STRs defining the target individuals inputs.

ordered_interface_hash.description: The ordered interface hash. Is used to verify all individuals meet the population interface requirements.

outputs.description: JSON list of valid EP_TYPE_STRs defining the target individuals outputs.

population_hash.description: SHA256 of the population configuration settings.

size.description: Number of individuals to create and/or evolve by default in each epoch (can be overridden by the active flag).

survivability.description: 'import <git_repo>.<survivability_import> as survivability_function' must be valid python.

uid.description: Integer UID of the population in the Gene Pool.

updated.description: The UTC date and time user defined fields not used by Erasmus were updated.

worker_id.description: The ID of the worker that created the population.
